jobDescription: Job Number: R0028685 System Data Analyst, MidKey Role:  Apply expertise in quantitative analysis, data mining, and the presentation of data to review data models and collaborate with the system integrator in support of large transformation effort across numerous existing application environments. Translate flat files and batch files from various databases and prepare for seamless transfer of data for system integration. Work within a multi-disciplinary team under the direction of a data architect.  Basic Qualifications:  -3+ years of experience in positions supporting data analysis or system analysis  -Experience with database environments, including Access, SQL, and Oracle  -Experience in working with clients and other contractors in a client office environment  -Knowledge of data governance models  -Secret clearance  Additional Qualifications:  -Experience with DoD data systems  -BA or BS degree  -MOS Access, SQL, or Oracle DB Certification  Clearance:  Applicants selected will be subject to a security investigation and may need to meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information; Secret clearance is required.  Were an EOE that empowers our peopleno matter their race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or veteran statusto fearlessly drive change.NMC
